verses.verse: "Then we turned <S%H6437><s%> and set <S%H5265><s%> out for the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> to the Red <S%H5488><s%> <S%H3220><s%> Sea, <S%H3220><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, and circled <S%H5437><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> for many <S%H7227><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>
"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
'You have circled <S%H5437><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> mountain <S%H2022><s%> long <S%H7227><s%> enough. <S%H7227><s%> [Now] turn <S%H6437><s%> north, <S%H6828><s%>

and command <S%H6680><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "You will pass <S%H5674><s%> through the territory <S%H1366><s%> of your brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in Seir; <S%H8165><s%> and they will be afraid <S%H3372><s%> of you. So be very <S%H3966><s%> careful; <S%H8104><s%>

do not provoke <S%H1624><s%> them, for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you any <S%H4480><s%> of their land, <S%H776><s%> even <S%H5704><s%> [as little as] a footstep <S%H4096><s%> <S%H3709><s%> <S%H7272><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> Mount <S%H2022><s%> Seir <S%H8165><s%> to Esau <S%H6215><s%> as a possession. <S%H3425><s%>

"You shall buy <S%H7666><s%> food <S%H400><s%> from them with money <S%H3701><s%> so that you may eat, <S%H398><s%> and you shall also <S%H1571><s%> purchase <S%H3739><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> from them with money <S%H3701><s%> so that you may drink. <S%H8354><s%>

"For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has blessed <S%H1288><s%> you in all <S%H3605><s%> that you have done; <S%H3027><s%> He has known <S%H3045><s%> your wanderings <S%H1980><s%> through this <S%H2088><s%> great <S%H1419><s%> wilderness. <S%H4057><s%> These <S%H2088><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> has been with you; you have not lacked <S%H2637><s%> a thing. <S%H1697><s%>"'

"So we passed <S%H5674><s%> beyond <S%H5674><s%> <S%H4480><s%> our brothers <S%H251><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> away <S%H4480><s%> from the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> road, <S%H1870><s%> away <S%H4480><s%> from Elath <S%H9014><s%> and from Ezion-geber. And we turned <S%H6437><s%> and passed <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Moab. <S%H4124><s%>

"Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Do not harass <S%H9475><s%> Moab, <S%H4124><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> provoke <S%H1624><s%> them to war, <S%H4421><s%> for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you any <S%H4480><s%> of their land <S%H776><s%> as a possession, <S%H3425><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> Ar <S%H6144><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> as a possession. <S%H3425><s%>
(The Emim <S%H368><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> there formerly, <S%H6440><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> as great, <S%H1419><s%> numerous, <S%H7227><s%> and tall <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakim. <S%H6062><s%>
Like the Anakim, <S%H6062><s%> they are also <S%H637><s%> regarded <S%H2803><s%> as Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%> but the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Emim. <S%H368><s%>

The Horites <S%H2752><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> but the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> them and destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them from before <S%H6440><s%> them and settled <S%H3427><s%> in their place, <S%H8478><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of their possession <S%H3425><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to them.)

'Now <S%H6258><s%> arise <S%H6965><s%> and cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered <S%H2218><s%> yourselves.' So we crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered. <S%H2218><s%>

"Now the time <S%H3117><s%> that it took <S%H1980><s%> for us to come <S%H1980><s%> from Kadesh-barnea, until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> we crossed <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the brook <S%H5158><s%> Zered, <S%H2218><s%> was thirty-eight years; <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the generation of the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> perished <S%H8552><s%> from within <S%H7130><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them.

"Moreover <S%H1571><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was against them, to destroy <S%H2000><s%> them from within <S%H7130><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> they all perished. <S%H8552><s%>

"So it came <S%H1961><s%> about when <S%H9201><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> had finally <S%H8552><s%> perished <S%H8552><s%> <S%H4191><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%>
that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>
'You shall cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Ar, <S%H6144><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of Moab, <S%H4124><s%> today. <S%H3117><s%>

'And when you come <S%H7126><s%> opposite <S%H4136><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> do not harass <S%H9475><s%> them nor <S%H408><s%> provoke <S%H1624><s%> them, for I will not give <S%H5414><s%> you any <S%H4480><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon <S%H5983><s%> as a possession, <S%H3425><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> it to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lot <S%H3876><s%> as a possession. <S%H3425><s%>'

(It is also <S%H637><s%> regarded <S%H2803><s%> as the land <S%H776><s%> of the Rephaim, <S%H7497><s%> [for] Rephaim <S%H7497><s%> formerly <S%H6440><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in it, but the Ammonites <S%H5984><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> them Zamzummin, <S%H2157><s%>

a people <S%H5971><s%> as great, <S%H1419><s%> numerous, <S%H7227><s%> and tall <S%H7311><s%> as the Anakim, <S%H6062><s%> but the Lord <S%H3068><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them before <S%H6440><s%> them. And they dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> them and settled <S%H3427><s%> in their place, <S%H8478><s%>

just <S%H9201><s%> as He did <S%H6213><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau, <S%H6215><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in Seir, <S%H8165><s%> when <S%H834><s%> He destroyed <S%H8045><s%> the Horites <S%H2752><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> them; and they dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> them, and settled <S%H3427><s%> in their place <S%H8478><s%> even <S%H5704><s%> to this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%>

And the Avvim, <S%H5761><s%> who lived <S%H3427><s%> in villages <S%H9161><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> the Caphtorim <S%H3732><s%> who came <S%H3318><s%> from Caphtor, <S%H3731><s%> destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them and lived <S%H3427><s%> in their place. <S%H8478><s%>)

'Arise, <S%H6965><s%> set <S%H5265><s%> out, and pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon. <S%H769><s%> Look! <S%H7200><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and his land <S%H776><s%> into your hand; <S%H3027><s%> begin <S%H2490><s%> to take <S%H3423><s%> possession <S%H3423><s%> and contend <S%H1624><s%> with him in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

'This <S%H2088><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> I will begin <S%H2490><s%> to put <S%H5414><s%> the dread <S%H6343><s%> and fear <S%H3374><s%> of you upon the peoples <S%H5971><s%> everywhere <S%H3605><s%> under <S%H8478><s%> the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> who, <S%H834><s%> when they hear <S%H8085><s%> the report <S%H8088><s%> of you, shall tremble <S%H7264><s%> and be in anguish <S%H9123><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of you.'

"So I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> from the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Kedemoth <S%H6932><s%> to Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> with words <S%H1697><s%> of peace, <S%H7965><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

'Let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through your land, <S%H776><s%> I will travel <S%H1980><s%> only on the highway; <S%H1870><s%> I will not turn <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> to the right <S%H3225><s%> or to the left. <S%H8040><s%>

'You will sell <S%H7666><s%> me food <S%H400><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%> so that I may eat, <S%H398><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> me water <S%H4325><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%> so that I may drink, <S%H8354><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> let me pass <S%H5674><s%> through <S%H5674><s%> on foot, <S%H7272><s%>

just <S%H9201><s%> as the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Esau <S%H6215><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in Seir <S%H8165><s%> and the Moabites <S%H4125><s%> who live <S%H3427><s%> in Ar <S%H6144><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> for me, until <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> I cross <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> the Jordan <S%H3383><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> is giving <S%H5414><s%> to us.'

"But Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Heshbon <S%H2809><s%> was not willing <S%H14><s%> for us to pass <S%H5674><s%> through his land; for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> hardened <S%H7185><s%> his spirit <S%H7307><s%> and made <S%H553><s%> his heart <S%H3824><s%> obstinate, <S%H553><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> him into your hand, <S%H3027><s%> as [he is] today. <S%H3117><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to me, 'See, <S%H7200><s%> I have begun <S%H2490><s%> to deliver <S%H5414><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and his land <S%H776><s%> over <S%H6440><s%> to you. Begin <S%H2490><s%> to occupy, <S%H3423><s%> that you may possess <S%H3423><s%> his land. <S%H776><s%>'
"Then Sihon <S%H5511><s%> with all <S%H3605><s%> his people <S%H5971><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> out to meet <S%H7122><s%> us in battle <S%H4421><s%> at Jahaz. <S%H3096><s%>

"And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> him over <S%H6440><s%> to us; and we defeated <S%H5221><s%> him with his sons <S%H1121><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

"So we captured <S%H3920><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his cities <S%H5892><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> and utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed <S%H2763><s%> the men, <S%H4962><s%> women <S%H802><s%> and children <S%H2945><s%> of every <S%H3605><s%> city. <S%H5892><s%> We left <S%H7604><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> survivor. <S%H8300><s%>
"We took <S%H962><s%> only <S%H7534><s%> the animals <S%H929><s%> as our booty <S%H962><s%> and the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> we had captured. <S%H3920><s%>

"From Aroer <S%H6177><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is on the edge <S%H8193><s%> of the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Arnon <S%H769><s%> and [from] the city <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the valley, <S%H5158><s%> even to Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> there was no <S%H3808><s%> city <S%H7151><s%> that was too <S%H4480><s%> high <S%H7682><s%> for us; the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> over <S%H6440><s%> to us.

"Only <S%H7534><s%> you did not go <S%H7126><s%> near <S%H7126><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ammon, <S%H5983><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> along <S%H3027><s%> the river <S%H5158><s%> Jabbok <S%H2999><s%> and the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the hill <S%H2022><s%> country, <S%H2022><s%> and wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> our God <S%H430><s%> had commanded <S%H6680><s%> us.
